```{r}
df <- read_dta("~/SchoolWork/Y2S1/Macro/Data/PSID/PSID.dta")
head(df, 10)
```

```{r}
earn <- sample(c("ER13218", "ER17229", "ER21153", "ER25142", "ER36147", "ER42182", "ER47495", "ER53195", "ER60210", "ER66211", "ER72211", "ER78216", "ER82199"), nrow(df), replace = TRUE)
df <- df %>%
  pivot_longer(
    c("ER13218", "ER17229", "ER21153", "ER25142", "ER36147", "ER42182", "ER47495", "ER53195", "ER60210", "ER66211", "ER72211", "ER78216", "ER82199")
    , names_to = "year", values_to = "earnings"
  ) %>%
  mutate(year = as.numeric(str_extract(year, "\\d+"))) %>%
  mutate(earnings = ifelse(earnings == 999999, NA, earnings))
```
